title: SUMMER IN DOWNTWN NEWBURYPORT!! FURNISHED 2B ALL UTILS !
posting_body: ['ENJOY AN ALL-SUMMER VACATION in an AWESOME DOWNTWN NEWBURYPORT RENTAL, the BEACH is just A FEW MINUTES DRIVE, and GREAT RESTAURANTS when you get back !!', 'AVAILABLE NOW, $89.00/day, 60 DAY MINIMUM, the unit is called "9G2".', 'A 2-BEDROOM APARTMENT UNIT--FURNISHED + DECORATED BY A PROFESSIONAL DESIGNER--comfortable and quiet with an excellent downtwn Newburyport location.', 'RATE: $89.00/DAY, 60 DAYS MINIMUM, then you can renew if you want to stay on.', "It's about a block from State Street near the library and from here, you can WORK AT HOME in the PRIVATE OFFICE/DINING ROOM, then walk a few blocks to everything, or drive 9 minutes to the beach for sun and the amazing Atlantic Ocean, plus sunsets and beach walks followed by fine dining!", ' ', 'And we now have EV CHARGING at the end of the block.', 'ALL UTILITIES are included: Heat, hot water, gas, electric, WIFI.', ' ', 'And if you have an electric car, we have an EV charging station at the end of the block.', 'Completely furnished with antique furniture, art, curtains & drapes, and decorated with many beautiful things.', ' Very private, quiet, peaceful, comfortable.', ' Feels like "home".', 'Complete kitchen and separate dining room (office) with everything you need to cook and serve.', ' Three closets.', ' Bathroom with full tub & shower, recently updated.', 'TWO comfortable Queen size beds, dressers, side tables, lamps, couches, chairs, dining table, desk, coffee table.', 'Also available: an assigned parking space in our private lot.', "DRIVING, you'll find it's only 10mins to I-95, I-495, Amesbury, Newbury, Rowley, Salisbury, and SEABROOK NH with a lot to see, many many restaurants, and all the big name stores,", '20mins to Georgetown, Boxford, Ipswich, Essex,', '30 mins to PORTSMOUTH NH, KITTERY ME, Peabody, Danvers, Topsfield, Wakefield', '45 mins to BOSTON (1hour by train or C&J bus), Andover, Woburn', 'under 60 mins to CONCORD NH, MANCHESTER NH, NASHUA NH,', 'and just over an hour to PORTLAND ME, Worcester, Lake Winnepesaukee, and the nearest SKI AREA!!', "If you're in transition, we're willing to rent for less than a year.", '(60 day min)', "And if you're looking for something more compact, there are also several STUDIOS for $79/day, 60-day min.", 'See our other CL ads.', 'The best way to inquire is to TEXT ME at Six1Seven, 7Nine9, Eight2Three3 -- any day or evening (but please not after 10PM).', "Email works, too, but it's a little longer for me to get back to you.", ' Sorry, no pets.']
